audio_description: HELLO, PICHUKISTA CRAZY FOOD LOVERS! ICAR RACHAR RAMBULE is here! First, greetings to all Kannadigas! How are you all? I hope everyone is always doing well on this Earth!

audio_description: Happy, happy — did you eat? Let’s make it spicy again!

This is Dunne Biryani from Shivaji Military Hotel, Bangalore – very famous! They make it with mutton and chicken. Nearby, they cook chicken separately. When you see it, your mouth starts watering. The combination is just extraordinary!

audio_description: The taste is amazing! They use a 50-50 mix of oil and ghee with Chitti Mutyala rice. That’s why it’s super special. And the combination of spices used is mind-blowing. Truly makes you go crazy with delight!
